html:
Welcome to Voyzu ERP / CRM

Powered by ERP Next

Voyzu ERP / CRM is a powerful business planning, operations and web platform. The platform is built on the open source ERPNext system, and has been customised by Voyzu. The system is hosted and supported by Voyzu

Active Modules

Active modules are available on your left hand menu and supported by Voyzu

  • Simple Accounting
  • CRM
  • Customers and Billing (includes basic items)
  • User Management (up to 10 users)
  • Tools (import/export, manual data backup, custom print setup)

Standard Modules

Available modules can be installed and supported by Voyzu. All modules include consultation, setup and support. Pricing for these modules depends on your company size and support needed.

Contact us to activate any of the following modules:

  • Advanced accounting (asset management, muli-currency, international tax etc)
  • Advanced sales (includes quotations, pricelists, discounts, loyalty points, recurring billing and customer portal)
  • Automatic Bank Transaction Importing (contact us for availaibility and pricing for your country)
  • Suppliers and Ordering
  • HR (includes timesheeting and payroll)
  • Email communications (Newsletters, email marketing campaigns)
  • Support and Helpdesk
  • Advanced inventory (includes manufacturing and warehousing)
  • Project Management (includes timesheeting)
  • Office (tasks, calendar, email)

Technical modules

The following technical modules can be installed and supported by Voyzu. Pricing for these modules depends on your company size and support needed.

Contact us to activate any of the following modules:

  • Off-site data backup (AWS | Google Drive | DropBox)
  • Single Sign On (SSO)
  • Custom domain name (erp.yourdomain.com)

Advanced Solutions

Under the hood the Voyzu ERP / CRM system is powered by a powerful Rapid Applicaiton Development platform. Because of this, custom web solutions can be developed in a very cost-effective way.

Pricing for custom solutions depends on your requirements

Contact us to enquire about advanced solutions

Examples of the kind of customised solutions possible include:

  • Workflows
  • Integrations. For example integrating inventory and orders with your website
  • Telephony. PABX and contact centre solutions
  • Marketing and website analytics
  • Forums. To build community across your customers
  • Event management solutions
  • Learning management solutions
